TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DecoderFallbackBuffer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一个缓冲区，该缓冲区允许回退处理程序在解码器无法对输入字节序列进行解码时将替换字符串返回到该解码器。

span.span: Provides a buffer that allows a fallback handler to return an alternate string to a decoder when it cannot decode an input byte sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码定义的 Unicode 字符和编码的字节序列之间的映射。An encoding defines a mapping between a Unicode character and an encoded sequence of bytes. 如果没有映射定义特定字节序列，一个解码操作，从而将输入的字节序列转换为输出字符，将失败。A decoding operation, which converts an input byte sequence to an output character, fails if no mapping is defined for a particular byte sequence. .NET Framework 提供失败处理机制，称为回退如果无法执行转换。The .NET Framework provides a failure handling mechanism, called a fallback, if a conversion cannot be performed. 所有解码器回退处理程序必须都实现以下：All decoder fallback handlers must implement the following: - 解码器回退，表示由类派生自类。A decoder fallback, which is represented by a class derived from the class. - 解码器回退缓冲区，其类型派生自此表示可以返回一个字符串的转换操作的类。A decoder fallback buffer, which is represented by a type derived from the class that can return a string to the conversion operation. 回退机制可以使用三个策略来处理转换失败：Fallbacks can use three strategies to handle conversion failures: - 最佳的映射。Best-fit mapping. 解码器回退缓冲区可以返回一个字符串，表示近似为输入的字节序列。The decoder fallback buffer can return a string that represents a close approximation to the input byte sequence. .NET Framework 不提供最佳的公共实现。The .NET Framework does not provide a public best-fit implementation. - 替换。Replacement. 解码器回退缓冲区可以返回一个字符串，例如一个问号 ("？")，指示无法解码字节序列。The decoder fallback buffer can return a string, such as a question mark ("?"), that indicates that a byte sequence could not be decoded. 在.NET Framework 中，和类提供公共替换回退缓冲区实现。In the .NET Framework, the and classes provide a public replacement fallback buffer implementation. 构造函数类使你能够将替换字符串定义。The constructor of the class enables you to define the replacement string. - 异常。Exception. 实现引发异常，指示字节序列不能进行解码，并终止解码操作。The implementation throws an exception, which indicates that a byte sequence cannot be decoded, and terminates the decoding operation. 在这种情况下，回退处理程序必须提供实现中，尽管它不会返回一个字符串解码器。In this case, the fallback handler must provide a implementation, although it does not return a string to the decoder. 在.NET Framework 中，和类提供的公共异常回退实现引发当不能解码字节序列。In the .NET Framework, the and classes provide a public exception fallback implementation that throws a when a byte sequence cannot be decoded. 中的缓冲区实现表示要返回到以响应解码器解码器回退的整个字符串。The buffer in a implementation represents the entire string to be returned to the decoder in response to a decoder fallback. 通常，实现还包括状态信息，例如要返回到解码器和剩余字符数要返回的下一个字符的索引。Generally, implementations also include state information, such as the index of the next character to return to the decoder and the number of remaining characters to be returned. 因为是一个抽象类，它需要派生的类以实现最少的以下成员：Because is an abstract class, it requires derived classes to implement the following members at a minimum: - 方法，它不能对字节序列进行解码时，解码器调用该方法。The method, which is called by the decoder when it cannot decode a byte sequence. 解码器将两条信息传递给回退缓冲区实现： 它包含无法解码的字节数组中并输入的字节数组中的第一个字节的索引。The decoder passes two pieces of information to the fallback buffer implementation: an array containing the bytes that could not be decoded and the index of the first byte in the input byte array. 解码器回退异常处理程序中，在此方法中引发异常。In a decoder fallback exception handler, the exception is thrown in this method. 否则，该方法返回`true`如果提供了回退或`false`如果它不存在。Otherwise, the method returns `true` if it provides a fallback, or `false` if it does not. - 方法，如果解码器重复调用该方法返回`true`。The method, which is called repeatedly by the decoder if the method returns `true`. 在后续调用中，该处理程序应返回其缓冲区中的每个字符。In successive calls, the handler should return each character in its buffer. 当它返回所有字符后时，它应返回 U + 0000。When it has returned all characters, it should return U+0000. 异常回退处理程序始终返回 U + 0000。An exception fallback handler always returns U+0000. - 方法，它尝试将指针移到缓冲区中的前一个位置，并指示移动是否成功。The method, which tries to move the pointer to the previous position in the buffer and indicates whether the move was successful. 异常处理程序始终返回`false`。An exception handler always returns `false`. - 属性，它指示要返回到解码器的剩余字符数。The property, which indicates the number of remaining characters to be returned to the decoder. 异常回退处理程序将始终返回零。An exception fallback handler always returns zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool Fallback (byte[] bytesUnknown, int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Fallback(unsigned int8[] bytesUnknown, int32 index) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Fallback (bytesUnknown As Byte(), index As Integer) As Boolean
public: abstract bool Fallback(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ bytesUnknown, int index);

param.name: index
param.span: bytesUnknown 中字节的索引位置。

span.span: The index position of a byte in bytesUnknown.

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，准备回退缓冲区以便对指定输入字节序列进行处理。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, prepares the fallback buffer to handle the specified input byte sequence.

returns.span: 如果回退缓冲区能处理 则为 ；如果回退缓冲区忽略 ，则为 。

span.span: if the fallback buffer can process ; if the fallback buffer ignores .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法调用如果他们遇到无法解码的未知的输入的字节序列。The , , and methods call if they encounter an unknown input byte sequence that cannot be decoded. 返回值`true`指示回退缓冲区可以处理的输入的字节序列，这会导致调用的方法调用方法来获取回退缓冲区每个字符。A return value of `true` indicates that the fallback buffer can process the input byte sequence, which causes the calling method to call the method to obtain each character of the fallback buffer. 因为它不会处理各个字节异常回退处理程序中的方法引发异常。Because it does not process individual bytes, the method in an exception fallback handler throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract char GetNextChar ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance char GetNextChar() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetNextChar () As Char
public: abstract char GetNextChar();

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法检索回退缓冲区中的下一个字符。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves the next character in the fallback buffer.

returns.span: 回退缓冲区中的下一个字符。

span.span: The next character in the fallback buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在解码操作调用如果该操作遇到未知的字节序列的输入中的方法。A decoding operation calls the method if the operation encounters an unknown byte sequence in the input. 如果方法返回`true`，替代字符串存在，可以插入输出，而不是解码未知的输入。If the method returns `true`, a substitute string exists that can be inserted in the output instead of decoding the unknown input. 解码操作调用方法重复，并一次获取替代字符串中的一个字符。The decoding operation calls the method repeatedly and obtains the substitute string one character at a time. 当回退缓冲区中的所有字符均已都返回到解码器时，该方法应返回 U + 0000。When all characters in the fallback buffer have been returned to the decoder, the method should return U+0000. 对于异常回退处理程序，方法应返回 U + 0000。For an exception fallback handler, the method should return U+0000.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool MovePrevious ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MovePrevious() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function MovePrevious () As Boolean
public: abstract bool MovePrevious();

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此方法将使对 方法的下一次调用访问当前字符位置之前的数据缓冲区字符位置。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, causes the next call to the method to access the data buffer character position that is prior to the current character position.

returns.span: 如果 操作成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation was successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异常回退处理程序应返回`false`。An exception fallback handler should return `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract int Remaining { get; }
.property instance int32 Remaining
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Remaining As Integer
public: abstract property int Remaining { int get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，此属性获取当前 对象中要处理的剩余字符数。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the number of characters in the current object that remain to be processed.

value.span: 尚未处理的当前回退缓冲区中的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters in the current fallback buffer that have not yet been processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回`true`如果为非零值。The method returns `true` if is a nonzero value. 对于异常回退处理程序，方法应返回零。For an exception fallback handler, the method should return zero.

Public Overridable Sub Reset ()
public: virtual void Reset();

summary.span: 初始化所有与此回退缓冲区相关的数据和状态信息。

span.span: Initializes all data and state information pertaining to this fallback buffer.

para.span: 在调用方法，属性应返回 0，方法应返回 U + 0000，和方法应返回。

span.span: After calling the method, the property should return 0, the method should return U+0000, and the method should return .
